title: (x) Elegant website sans and serif - Eplica, Apex Sans/New {Florian, Marc O}
content:
Can anyone ID the serif and sans used here? Forever grateful, Sam

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Web Sans.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071219001520/http:/typophile.com/files/Web%20Sans.jpg) | 56.86 KB |
| [Web Serif.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071219001520/http:/typophile.com/files/Web%20Serif.jpg) | 25.74 KB |

 [‹ (x) Radiohead "In Rainbows" album cover - Transport Medium {Richard Hards}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071219001520/http:/typophile.com/node/40112 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Serif face, similar to Bookman or Clarendon - Times {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071219001520/http:/typophile.com/node/40110 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Sam Serif

comments.content:
Hi Sam,  
the serif is [Eplica](http://web.archive.org/web/20071219001520/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/eplica/).  
F

The sans is Apex Sans  
 [http://vllg.com/Thirstype/ApexSans/mudTyper+Weights/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071219001520/http:/vllg.com/Thirstype/ApexSans/mudTyper+Weights/ "http://vllg.com/Thirstype/ApexSans/mudTyper+Weights/")

If you’re considering licensing it, go for Apex New, a reworked/cleaned-up/”director’s cut” version:

[http://vllg.com/Thirstype/ApexNew/mudTyper+Weights/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071219001520/http:/vllg.com/Thirstype/ApexNew/mudTyper+Weights/ "http://vllg.com/Thirstype/ApexNew/mudTyper+Weights/")

Looks like the ” To ” combination in the Torino needs to be kerned a little better... :-)

Mikey :-)
Man you guys are good. Thanks so much!
